amendment.description: To require a report on the individuals being detained by the United States Government as enemy combatants.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1268 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 279.

Amendment SA 1268 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9451-9455, S9456; text: CR S9451) To require a report on the individuals being detained by the United States Government as enemy combatants.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1268 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 42. Record Vote Number: 279.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1268 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
